title: "Amazon Stock (NASDAQ:AMZN): What’s Ahead as It Eyes Profitability, Prioritizes AI"
excerpt: "As part of its broader cost restructuring strategy, Amazon is closing down several of its businesses, as they weren’t producing the returns the company hoped for. Amazon is winding down its live radio app Amp, which enabled users to take on the role of DJs, offering commentary while playing music tracks, as reported by Bloomberg ."
